parameter.name: clientId
parameter.description: Returns bills for a given client.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Status of the bill, either 'all' (default), 'open', 'past_due', 'paid'. This field will be obsoleted in the next version of the API.

parameter.name: state
parameter.description: Returns only those bills with the given state. One of 'draft', 'awaiting_approval', 'awaiting_payment', 'paid'.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: Returns records with an id greater than the offset.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of records to be returned. (int, default 1000)

parameter.name: createdSince
parameter.description: Returns records created on or after the date. (date, ISO 8601 format)

parameter.name: updatedSince
parameter.description: Returns records updated on or after the date. (date, ISO 8601 format)
